data.eml:eml: Alucitidae (Lepidoptera), a new family for the Mongolian fauna

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ustjuzhanin, Petr, Kovtunovich, Vasiliy, Yakovlev, Roman (2016): Alucitidae (Lepidoptera), a new family for the Mongolian fauna. Nota Lepidopterologica 39 (1): 61-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.39.8559, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/nl.39.8559
